history.narrative: Law 10-152, the “Omnibus Sports Consolidation Act of 1994,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 10-424, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Youth Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 3, 1994, and June 7, 1994, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 30, 1994, it was assigned Act No. 10-265 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 10-152 became effective on August 23, 1994.
As to the assumption of nonmilitary functions of the Armory Board by the Sports Commission, see § 3-1418.
